titles.title: Enhancing Spaceport Operations Act
Enhancing Spaceport Operations Act
A bill to provide special authority for the provision of commercial space launch support services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Enhancing Spaceport Operations Act
This bill authorizes the military departments to support federal and commercial space launch capacities on any domestic real property under the departmentsâ€™ control through the provision of space launch support services. The military departments are authorized to enter into a contract or other transaction with a commercial entity that intends to conduct space launch activities on a military installation.
